item.title: How to Read STAR (RNA-seq aligner) output
item.description: In this post, I’m gonna show you how to read the Log.final.out from RNA-seq aligner STAR. Table of Contents Background Goal of this post Log.final.out Break it down Wrap up Background For most of beginner Bioinformaticians, students, including myself back then, tend to apply those reads mappers blindly and head into the downstream analysis. Basically run with the default parameters, and care less about:
